articles.title: James Carafano: US airstrikes in Mideast — sending THIS clear message to friends and foes alike
articles.description: The strikes were a justified and proportional response to recent attacks.
articles.content:
The United States ended the year with punitive airstrikes on extremists in Iraq, Syriaand Somalia. That’s a signal to all. America isn’t in withdrawal — anywhere. Nor have Americans declared victory against Islamist terrorism and walked away from the fight.
